title: IObit Uninstaller 6.2.0.933
text: Special Offer: Advanced SystemCare 9 PRO with 2016 Gift Pack $29.99! Includes Advanced SystemCare 9 PRO, IObit Uninstaller PRO, Protected Folder and Smart Defrag 5 PRO at one Price IObit Uninstaller helps you remove unwanted programs and browser plug-ins/toolbars easily even when Windows "Add or Remove Programs" fails. Just one of the tools from Advanced SystemCare Free .Unlike some uninstallers that simply use the included program uninstall routine, IObit Uninstaller will also scan and remove all leftovers entries with Powerful Scan. For system stability, this utility still creates a system restore point before every uninstallation and provides a better management of system restore point. Version History for IObit Uninstaller: + Supported uninstalling more than 8,000 malicious toolbars & Ads plug-ins for much safer and cleaner browser. + Enhanced real-time monitoring of leftovers missed by other uninstall programs. + More powerful and thorough Force Uninstall. + Fixed the occasional failure of removing uninstalled programs from Startup.
